channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50K. How can this help us?
item.description: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA.”

item.title: America can’t out-innovate China without mechanical engineers — or robots
item.description: Shaun Edwards, co-founder and CTO of Plus One Robotics, explainss why the U.S. needs a national strategy that invests in STEM education. The post Amer...

item.title: New embedding model leaderboard shakeup: Google takes #1 while Alibaba’s open source alternative closes gap
item.description: Google's new Gemini Embedding model now leads the MTEB benchmark. But it is facing fierce competition from closed and open source rivals.

item.title: He broke the Bank of England — now he’s coming for America. How to bet with this trading legend using ETFs.
item.description: Stanley Druckenmiller’s bet against America’s debt is no ordinary trade.

item.title: 5 key questions your developers should be asking about MCP
item.description: It’s MCP projects in production, not specification elegance or market buzz, that will determine if MCP (or something else) stays on top.

item.title: ‘I have a degree in economics’: I’m 70, earn $250K a year and have $3.7 million in investments. Is it time to retire?
item.description: “I have a home worth $1.3 million with $900,000 in equity. I have not paid it off as I have a 3% interest rate.”

item.title: My brother-in-law left $600K to a friend. He experienced oxygen deprivation due to COPD. Can my husband contest the will?
item.description: “Around 30 days before passing, he changed everything to go to a friend.”

item.title: Company insiders now are bearish to the extreme — but they’re upbeat on these 11 stocks
item.description: Overall, executives and directors are down on 10 S&P 500 sectors — and positive about just this one.

item.title: Maxvision buys core robot assets of Aldebaran, including Nao and Pepper

item.title: Meet AnyCoder, a new Kimi K2-powered tool for fast prototyping and deploying web apps
item.description: For novice developers or even those with expertise who want to spin up a new project fast, AnyCoder seems like a great place to start.
